classes

Class MenuItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.MenuItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Food, PromotionPackage

    public abstract class MenuItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a menu item as appear on the food menu. Any menu item on a food menu has a menu name, description and price.
    Since:
    2016-10-24
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    stella
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
